data.message:
When you caught my eye for the first time,
My world stood still for a little while.
This feeling I cant explain,
How you took my breath away.
I wondered if you knew, 
What I was going through.
If you felt the same way,
Or am I going insane?
It's like you reached into my soul,
Giving me that old Rock-and-Roll.
I can feel it in the beat,
Knowing that you're next to me.
You help take away the pain,
Say good-bye to my yesterday.
Baby you've shown me the light,
Love is blind but you gave me back sight...
Put your heart next to mine. -Love Ash
